channel.title: Open Source on Adam Parker's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Adam Parker's Blog

item.title: My First Open Source Pull Request
item.description: I always thought open source would be a scary world and the start of it was. I was shown a nice little website named First Timers Only ( https://www.firsttimersonly.com/ ), and this was my entry point. This lead me to the UpForGrabs page and I started filtering by what I knew, .NET. (Yes I skipped first contributions, if I donâ€™t know how to do a pull request after working in industry for a year, I may be in the wrong profession)
